text: Could Matt Lauer still make a career comeback? NBC fired the Today anchor in November after he was accused of sexual misconduct, and he has not been heard from since. But recently, there has been some indication that he ’ s not planning to stay out of the spotlight for long, and he ’ s hoping to bounce back from the scandal.
